definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
ton-kilometer (unit of capacity of transport system)
overall tonnage (of a shipping fleet or company)

pinyin: qian1 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4

definition: tonnage/class in tons (of a passenger ship)
old form of London, capital of United Kingdom/now written 倫敦|伦敦

bai3 wan4 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4

sentences.english: We have 800-ton heat treatment capability per month.
sentences.chinese: 生产手段齐全能量大，生产能力每月可达800吨。

sentences.english: They built a crane capable of lifting 150 tons.
sentences.chinese: 他们造了一台能吊起150吨重量的吊车。

sentences.english: An edible factory with annual production of 2000 tons is planned to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 拟建山野菜速冻保鲜厂一座，年加工能力2000吨。

sentences.english: Nearly 400 tons of accumulated refuse and dregs were removed altogether in five days.
sentences.chinese: 五天内清洁工运走了近四百吨堆积的垃圾与渣土。

sentences.english: The annual output is about 260 tons.
sentences.chinese: 有龙井长叶和龙井43，年产约260吨。

sentences.english: General considerations, one-time application of dry sludge per 667m2 should be less than 8 tons.
sentences.chinese: 总体考虑，一次性每亩施用干污泥应控制在8吨以下。

sentences.english: Xanthone was reduced to xanthydrol by sodium borohydride.
sentences.chinese: 用硼氢化钠对呫吨酮还原得到呫吨醇。

sentences.english: Xanthone was reduced to xanthydrol by sodium borohydride.
sentences.chinese: 用硼氢化钠对呫吨酮还原得到呫吨醇。

sentences.english: These readings were taken with 100 Ton of molten metal in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据来自100吨熔化炉内熔化的金属。
另有123吨物资通过海路运达。

sentences.english: The building used pre-fabricated material, including 200 tonnes of steel.
sentences.chinese: 大楼用了预制材料，包括200吨钢材。

sentences.english: It takes eleven tons of pressure on a piano to tune it.
sentences.chinese: 要一架钢琴出声，须用十一吨压力。

sentences.english: Otherwise please don t waste your time.
sentences.chinese: 否则请不要浪费你的时间吨。

sentences.english: Another 1,500 tons is being pumped from two nearby buildings.
sentences.chinese: 另外1500吨水正从临近两座建筑排出。

sentences.english: The world’s miners dug up 2, 689 tonnes of gold last year.
sentences.chinese: 世界采矿主去年一共挖出了2689吨黄金。

sentences.english: The huge cake was about 720 meters long with a total weight of more than nine tons.
sentences.chinese: 这个蛋糕巨无霸长约720米，总重超过9吨。
